website_summaries.verdict: Moisturizers help keep the tan streak free while giving a natural looking color.
pros: Light lotion goes on evenly and is easy to apply, without having an obnoxious odor
Stays colorfast without transferring to clothes
cons: Some felt it needed too much reapplication to keep the color, but the great price point makes that less of an issue

customer_reviews.title: Gives just the right amount of "glow"
customer_reviews.text: I love this gradual tanning lotion - it goes on so smoothly without streaking and its moisturizing benefits last a couple of days. I'm unhappy that it's been discontinued. Haven't found another gradual tanning product that I like as well, including Jergens.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a light, glowing tan
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product, living up to it reputation. So glad I bought the 3 pack. It will get me through the summer into the fall easily. I have pale skin that tans, but slowly so I bought the medium to dark Visible Glow and it got me the light tan I wanted. No streaking, no orange, not greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Love this skin tone enhancer.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion to help give me a bit of color back. Doesn’t turn that funky orange. Slowly gives you some color/vibrancy back, especially in the winter months (or areas I don’t expose to the sun). Does have the suntan lotion smell to it, but not too strong.
customer_reviews.author: Calideb

customer_reviews.title: Really great. Especially for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff gives a very nice glow with no streaks. I do not wear foundation any more...just this. I am careful not to wear it in outdoor situations where I might perspire a lot. I like the sun, but try not to get toooooo much on my face...62 and no wrinkles 🎉🎉🎉🎉
customer_reviews.author: Diane J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and looks very natural! Love it! I don't have the time to go to a tanning salon for a spray tan so I use this usually three to four times a week. Not a huge fan of the smell but I mostly use it at night so not a huge deal! Great price too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant smell and sticky
customer_reviews.text: I read all the positive reviews and thought why not give it a try. It arrived on time but was not at all what I expected. Customers said there was little no odor. It Does have an unpleasant odor like YUCK and when u apply the lotion and rub it in, it makes you feel sticky. Not satisfied at all. Will be returning!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Starnes

customer_reviews.title: Gives a gentle tan
customer_reviews.text: If you just need a light tan... than this is the right cream for you. It doesn’t make you orange which is good but it also doesn’t make you dark. It gives you a gentle tan nothing drastic.
customer_reviews.author: South

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This tanning lotion does NOT perform well at all, unless you apply it every day; and then, the "tan" is barely noticeable. There are other self-tanners available on Amazon that are far better and produce a much darker tan with just one application and only have to be applied twice a week to maintain a visible "tan."
customer_reviews.author: Maeonides

customer_reviews.title: Super pleasant smelling and a great color
customer_reviews.text: I use self-tanners all the time, and this is one of my favorites. Super pleasant smelling and a great color. I am fair skinned and this looked really natural. I like it just as much if not better than Jergens Natural Glow.
customer_reviews.author: Annika

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you will love it...
customer_reviews.text: I can't seem to find this product in the stores anymore, so happy I could get it through Amazon.. I like this product so much more than Jergens lotion.. I will buy again.. Thank you.. works well it goes on even not orange coloring, smells nice like lotion, gives me a good even tan glow...
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Drees

customer_reviews.title: Stuff works well
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised. It took about 10 days to see a difference but for 8 bucks it was well worth it. It would have cost me 50 to get the same results at my local tanning salon and would have taken probably 10 visits.
customer_reviews.author: fresh

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this stuff for years! Use ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this stuff for years! Use it every day and you don't have to worry about the problems with the sun!
customer_reviews.author: Linda H

customer_reviews.title: best self tanner
customer_reviews.text: I've used them all but the price for the quality can't be beat. Very natural tan!!!
customer_reviews.author: cargil

customer_reviews.title: Works well, inexpensive /will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Good natural tan look. The fragrance is ok and doesn't last long. Why pay more?
customer_reviews.author: MarketerOne

customer_reviews.title: It is my favorite self-tanner
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't seem to be available where I shop any longer, and I like it so much that I set out to find it on line. I like the scent. I like the color/tone of my skin the best using this self-tanner versus many others that I've tried. I also like the scent.
customer_reviews.author: amy c

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good stuff, if they could get rid of the smell it would be great
customer_reviews.author: Kim Marie Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Good price for nice product!!
customer_reviews.text: This product does the trick for a whole lot less money. Pretty, natural color.
customer_reviews.author: sharont

customer_reviews.title: I ordered "medium to dark" and received "fair to medium" ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered "medium to dark" and received "fair to medium", which doesn't leave much color at all so I have to use twice as much. I won't order from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Coreen P.

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing deal for three tubes of lotion
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing deal for three tubes of lotion, and they work great. The lotion goes on evenly and does not streak, and leaves your skin with a nice tan.
customer_reviews.author: Mel1222

customer_reviews.title: Stick with the tanning salon
customer_reviews.text: It works for if you can't make it to the tanning salon but I wouldn't use it everyday it made my skin get white spots
customer_reviews.author: Ronni

customer_reviews.title: This product is ok. It doesn't have the odor ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok. It doesn't have the odor that most self tanning lotions have which is pleasant. It will streak if you do not take the time to smooth in.
customer_reviews.author: clowey

customer_reviews.title: it will make you tan
customer_reviews.text: Finally a tanning solution that makes my ghost white legs look tan. Looks real not orange easy to apply great product.
customer_reviews.author: MylesD

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is the only self-tanner that I have used that does Not have an obnoxious odor. That is why it is the only one I buy now.
customer_reviews.author: martha hill

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quicker then expected and works GREAT! I had tried it out lat summer from ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quicker then expected and works GREAT! I had tried it out lat summer from the 99 cent store and ended up buying out 3 stores and using all summer. Great product! No streaks! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Conley

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for the last few years. It gives you a beautiful streak free tan glow, that isn't fake looking at all. Easy to apply, an affordable price. People ask me all the time about wh as t I use for self tanner and by far this one has them all beat! Highly recommend it if you're looking for that natural looking, glowing tan.
customer_reviews.author: daneault6

customer_reviews.title: As it has with others, it will leave you orange.
customer_reviews.text: As it has with others, it will leave you orange.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Prime Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Orange skin
customer_reviews.text: Not crazy about this product. It goes on streaky and is orange.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday subtle tanner!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this over my expensive brands because over time I get a natural looking tan that doesn't transfer to my sheets or white clothing. Plus you cannot beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Wolf3

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion. A bit thinner formula than jergens, but same performance with the traumaless and mess free formula of gradual tanning.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Vaugn

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the product
customer_reviews.text: It is a very subtle tan, not orange at all, but I noticed a difference after the first use. Great price for the product. The smell isn’t good or bad
customer_reviews.author: Jahna B

customer_reviews.title: Goes on smooth
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the lotion spreads on. Takes a bit longer to completely dry than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: toni

customer_reviews.title: This made my skin orange even though the other reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: This made my skin orange even though the other reviews indicated it did not. Maybe I got the wrong shade?
customer_reviews.author: Dawn in Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Size was bigger than expected. I love this product Works well to put some suntan color to your legs.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Adelman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's great! Tans evenly, does not have an unpleasant scent, just as good as the higher priced products
customer_reviews.author: Ann NH

customer_reviews.title: Naturally golden!
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is the best bang for your buck if you want a great natural glow.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Maberto

customer_reviews.title: This gives me just a little glow and color which is nice.
customer_reviews.text: I am very fair skinned. This gives me just a little glow and color which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best self tanner ever! Natural looking and long lasting tan without the self tan odor.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A

customer_reviews.title: Beat self tanner out there
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff ever!!! No orange look. Just a gradual hint of color. People think I'm tan from the Sun and it's actually from this. I have to avoid the Sun so this is the perfect solution. I've tried all of the self tanners and the moisturizers out there. This is the lightest one. Most of the other moisturizing tan lotions are super heavy period this is nice and light. Plus you can beat the price. I've had spray tans and this takes 5 mins every other day. So worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy C

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about a week now and really like it. It smells good (unlike Jergens) and after a week, I have a nice golden color. No streaks. Three tubes will last me quite a while, but I'll definitely repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Scorpio3813

customer_reviews.title: I have psoriasis and the tanning cream keeps my skin ...
customer_reviews.text: I have psoriasis and the tanning cream keeps my skin very moist so it does not flake. The tanning factor provides a cover so the redness is barely noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: The warden

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Less expensive that the top brands and does not dry your skin out and have that awful self-tanner odor (you know what I'm talking about ladies!). This builds a natural looking tan over about a 4-5 day application depending upon how tan you want to look. It will rub off on sheets but has washed out for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nini

customer_reviews.title: Suave Visible Glow Sunless tan lotion
customer_reviews.text: Subtle effect with continual usage. The medium to tan is not as dark as I would like, but it's a nice realistic color and it does not streak. I would recommend this 3 pack product. It works well and rates up there with more expensive brands! It also does not stain my clothing, and has minimal scent. Great price for the 3 pack!
customer_reviews.author: CPF

customer_reviews.title: Evems out skin color
customer_reviews.text: This lotion gives me a perfect even skin tone for African Americans. I have dark skin but it can be uneven this really works for an even color. Love. Smells good and moisturizing too. I didnt breakout either.
customer_reviews.author: WinnetteRenee

customer_reviews.title: Budget sunless tanning that works great - no mineral oil!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great inexpensive sunless tanning lotion that does not cause my skin to look orange or look fake. As long as I do not get it on the creases of my elbows, ankles or on my knees it looks very natural, doesn't smell bad, and isn't greasy. And it doesn't cost much - that's the best part - very pleased with this stuff
customer_reviews.author: Maximum Verbosity

customer_reviews.title: Smells way better than Jergens
customer_reviews.text: Smells way better than Jergens! Adds a nice glow to my legs without looking orange I use it maybe twice or once a week depending how dark I want my legs. Definitely a bargain 👌
customer_reviews.author: L.S

customer_reviews.title: a favorite
customer_reviews.text: great value. 3 pack. I used this consistently for a week and people commented on my nice tan. It has a nice scent, not too strong. it doesnt streak or stain. will continue to use
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: year around tan,
customer_reviews.text: this product is great, i put it on like lotion after bathing and it looks very natural after a few hours, i have bought it three tubes at a time, now on my second order. I love the stuff, works better than the high priced stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Rosilenda

customer_reviews.title: Gradual tan
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand better than Jergens natural glow, smell isn’t great but not horrible. Very gradual tan but make sure you wash your hands after application
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and not hideous. Blend well or you get streaks. Smell isn't horrible and dissipates. Be careful around knees and ankles. Stains clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Biali

customer_reviews.title: Will look like a streaky Oompa Loompa after one use
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pale and have tried many self-tanners. Thought this was too good to be true for the price....and well you get what you paid for. Tried it two different times both of which turned orange and very streaky, I didn't give it a 3rd try i threw all 3 bottles away. Wouldn't dare give these away unless you want them to look like a streaky oompa loompa.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: A great looking tan at a very loew price
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is inexpensive and yet works better than expected. It goes on nicely but has a slight odor although not too bad. More importantly, it gives a nice color and if you use it for three days, you'll end up with a very nice tan that doesn't wash off or fade in a few days. I was very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O'Malley

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: •Great price •Packaged well •Shipping was fast •Tanning lotion came in new condition •Looks exactly like the pictures Tanning lotion Pros: •Pleasant smell •Streak free •Moisturizes skin •Gradually builds tan in 5 hours •Beautiful skin color finish; doesn't have a orange undertone (more like brown with a hint yellow) Cons: • Tan last for 1-2 days •Can feel sticky if you apply an excessive amount of product because it's very hydrating
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer O'Dowd

customer_reviews.title: Nice self tanner
customer_reviews.text: This has a slight smell to it but it dissipates pretty quickly. It goes on nicely and doesn't stain my clothing but I haven't used it enough to know if it works well as far as tanning.
customer_reviews.author: Penni KnappTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS TANNING LOTION. IT GIVES NICE COLOR. SUGGEST YOU USE GLOVES FOR ANY SELF TANNER.
customer_reviews.author: roxy12

customer_reviews.title: Great tan
customer_reviews.text: Used for the first time yesterday. No strong smell and not as sticky as other products. Goes on like a light suntan lotion. Dries quickly and the smell is very light and actually does not smell bad Nice color. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the color not as hydrating as i would like the fragrance is very nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After two days I see a tan starting and smells good too. Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: So far it's as advertised. After two days I see a tan starting and smells good too. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Alys Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This lotion works better than other more expensive brands. It gives a natural color to my legs.
customer_reviews.author: Grape Lover

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Cant tell it's on except in a few days you'll see streaks of what the color should have been. The worst self tanner ever!
customer_reviews.author: coleridgedane

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works ok as a lotion, but the color is.VERY gradual- almost unnoticeable
customer_reviews.author: Atnorton

customer_reviews.title: Better than name brands
customer_reviews.text: Great color with no streaks, no orange pigment whatsoever, just dark tan. My favorite self tanning lotion
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: A great deal for three
customer_reviews.text: I do every other day but it works for me. A great deal for three.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay DeAngelis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this.. No streaking an went on smoothly an easy.
customer_reviews.author: besana_darlene

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still gives that "orange glow" but easy to put on and much less expensive than the wipes.
customer_reviews.author: William W. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have used before that's why I ordered it, works well
customer_reviews.author: gerri tenney

customer_reviews.title: Will Definitely Purchase Again!
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it goes on Smooth & it doesn't have a bad smell.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Grant

customer_reviews.title: The Suave Visible Glow Self Tanning Lotion is my favorite. This was a great value compared to many ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used many different self tanning lotions over the years. The Suave Visible Glow Self Tanning Lotion is my favorite. This was a great value compared to many lotions I have tried. There is not the usual unpleasant odor associated with self tanners. I can put this on after my shower in the morning and wear it all day. Most other self tanners have had such an odor that I wear them awhile and then shower again to remove the scent. This lotion has a pleasant mild scent. The color is natural and gives skin the look of a sunkist glow. I will definitely buy this product again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Stmonica

customer_reviews.title: Wish I Had Found This Great Self-Tanner Sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using self-tanners for over 25 years and this one is the best I have found and I only wish I had found it sooner! Nice consistency, good smell, and dries fast. Mort importantly it does not bleed on to clothes and linens like the other self-tanners I've used have done and the end result is a very realistic tan with minimal sunshine. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: KNRB
